Target 1 of the SDGs is "No Poverty." Here are some details about the sustainable achievements and initiatives related to this target at Future University:

- Full scholarships and financial aid programs are established to support students from low-income backgrounds.
- There are donation boxes for second-hand clothing to promote a culture of sharing and reduce waste.
- Future University collaborates with the community to provide free vocational training and skill enhancement courses.
- Volunteer activities are organized to assist homeless individuals and contribute to poverty alleviation efforts.

These initiatives aim to address poverty and create a more inclusive and equitable environment at Future University.
